parameters.duration: Call duration of the local user in seconds, represented by an aggregate value.

parameters.txAudioBytes: The total number of audio bytes sent, represented by an aggregate value.

parameters.txVideoBytes: The total number of video bytes sent, represented by an aggregate value.

parameters.rxAudioBytes: The total number of audio bytes received, represented by an aggregate value.

parameters.rxVideoBytes: The total number of video bytes received, represented by an aggregate value.

parameters.rxKBitRate: The receiving bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value.

parameters.rxAudioKBitRate: Audio receive bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value.

parameters.txAudioKBitRate: The bitrate (Kbps) of sending the audio packet.

parameters.rxVideoKBitRate: Video receive bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value.

parameters.txVideoKBitRate: The bitrate (Kbps) of sending the video.

parameters.txPacketLossRate: The packet loss rate (%) from the client to the Agora server before using the anti-packet-loss method.

parameters.rxPacketLossRate: The packet loss rate (%) from the Agora server to the client before using the anti-packet-loss method.

parameters.userCount:
The number of users in the channel.
      For COMMUNICATION profile: The number of users in the channel.
      For LIVE_BROADCASTING profile:
 If the local user is an audience member: The number of users in the channel = The number of hosts in the channel + 1.
 If the user is a host: The number of users in the channel = The number of hosts in the channel.

parameters.cpuAppUsage: The CPU usage (%) of the application.

parameters.cpuTotalUsage:
The system CPU usage (%).
      In the multi-kernel environment, this member represents the average CPU usage. The value = 100 - System Idle Progress in Task Manager.

parameters.gatewayRtt: The round-trip time delay from the client to the local router.

parameters.memoryAppUsageRatio:
The memory occupied by the application (%).
      This value is for reference only. Due to system limitations, you might
                            not get this value.

parameters.memoryTotalUsageRatio:
The memory occupied by the system (%).
      This value is for reference only. Due to system limitations, you might
                            not get this value.

parameters.memoryAppUsageInKbytes:
The memory occupied by the application (KB).
      This value is for reference only. Due to system limitations, you might
                            not get this value.
